processors.name: Convert Tools Data Avro to ORC

config.comments:
This is being used to prevent old files from getting reloaded. Old files could get reloaded if they were inadvertently touched.
File are moved to a ".processed" directory when they have been picked up and processed. By doing this, the only way old files could get re-loaded is if they were copied back into the directory being monitored.

processors.name: Skip files that have already been processed
